verses.text: He that \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w secret|strong="H5643"\w* place of the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w* shall \w abide|strong="H3885"\w* under the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of the \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*.\f + \fr 91.1 \ft abide: Heb. lodge\f*

I will \w say|strong="H0559"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add He is\add* my \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w* and my \w fortress|strong="H4686"\w*: my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; in him will I \w trust|strong="H0982"\w*.

Surely he shall \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thee from the \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* of the \w fowler|strong="H3353"\w*, \add and\add* from the \w noisome|strong="H1942"\w* \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*.

He shall \w cover|strong="H5526"\w* thee with his \w feathers|strong="H0084"\w*, and under his \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* shalt thou \w trust|strong="H2620"\w*: his \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \add shall be thy\add* \w shield|strong="H6793"\w* and \w buckler|strong="H5507"\w*.

Thou shalt not be \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* for the \w terror|strong="H6343"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*; \add nor\add* for the \w arrow|strong="H2671"\w* \add that\add* \w flieth|strong="H5774"\w* by \w day|strong="H3119"\w*;

\add Nor\add* for the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w* \add that\add* \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* in \w darkness|strong="H0652"\w*; \add nor\add* for the \w destruction|strong="H6986"\w* \add that\add* \w wasteth|strong="H7736"\w* at \w noonday|strong="H6672"\w*.

A \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* at thy \w side|strong="H6654"\w*, and ten \w thousand|strong="H7233"\w* at thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*; \add but\add* it shall not come \w nigh|strong="H5066"\w* thee.
Only with thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shalt thou \w behold|strong="H5027"\w* and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w reward|strong="H8011"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

Because thou hast \w made|strong="H7760"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add which is\add* my \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w*, \add even\add* the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w*, thy \w habitation|strong="H4583"\w*;
There shall no \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w befall|strong="H0579"\w* thee, neither shall any \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* come \w nigh|strong="H7126"\w* thy \w dwelling|strong="H0168"\w*.
For he shall give his \w angels|strong="H4397"\w* \w charge|strong="H6680"\w* over thee, to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thee in all thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.
They shall bear thee \w up|strong="H5375"\w* in \add their\add* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, lest thou \w dash|strong="H5062"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* against a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*.

Thou shalt \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* upon the \w lion|strong="H7826"\w* and \w adder|strong="H6620"\w*: the young \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* and the \w dragon|strong="H8577"\w* shalt thou trample under \w feet|strong="H7429"\w*.\f + \fr 91.13 \ft adder: or, asp\f*

Because he hath set his \w love|strong="H2836"\w* upon me, therefore will I \w deliver|strong="H6403"\w* him: I will set him on \w high|strong="H7682"\w*, because he hath \w known|strong="H3045"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

He shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon me, and I will \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* him: I \add will be\add* with him in \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*; I will \w deliver|strong="H2502"\w* him, and \w honour|strong="H3513"\w* him.

With \w long|strong="H0753"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w* will I \w satisfy|strong="H7646"\w* him, and \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* him my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.\f + \fr 91.16 \ft longâ€¦: Heb. length of days\f*
